special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: Frulam is a 5th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). Frulam has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): command, cure wounds, healing word, sanctuary

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): calm emotions, hold person, spiritual weapon

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 3rd level (2 slots): mass healing word, spirit guardians

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: Frulam attacks twice with her halberd.

actions.name: Halberd.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
